availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Thomas Schoolfield Sr. (Bracken County farmer)

body.p: Residence: Brooksville, Bracken County, Kentucky. A Maryland-born farmer. Married Mary.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District 1, Brooksville post office, p. 70.

Find A Grave, Entry for George Schoolfield (1801-1877), Find A Grave Memorial # 119401209, Keytesville City Cemetery, Keytesville Township, Chariton County, Missouri, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=schoolfield&GSfn=george&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSob=n&GRid=119401209&df=all& (accessed 17 Jul 2017).
